Miscellaneous Highlights: Zion Williamson is listed as out for Wednesday's second game of a back-to-back against Portland due to return to competition reconditioning.
Dejounte Murray (right elbow soreness/right shin contusion) is questionable for the Pelicans.
For Portland, Jerami Grant (face contusion) and Matisse Thybulle (right ankle) are out. Deni Avdija (right wrist sprain) and Donovan Clingan (rest) are questionable.
Others: The game will be played at 7 p.m. on January 9, 2025, and can be watched on TV via GCSEN or on radio via WWL.
